body_html: I can't reproduce your compilation error so it'll be hard for me to diagnose the root cause. However, you should be able to work around the problem by editing the tensorflow.bzl file and deleting the "-DTENSORFLOW_USE_EIGEN_THREADPOOL" string in the tf_copts() function.

body: I can't reproduce your compilation error so it'll be hard for me to diagnose the root cause. However, you should be able to work around the problem by editing the tensorflow.bzl file and deleting the  "-DTENSORFLOW_USE_EIGEN_THREADPOOL" string in the tf_copts() function.
